explains: n. 马蹄铁; U 形物

sentences.en: In order to withstand tidal currents, juvenile horseshoe crabs frequently burrow in the sand.
sentences.cn: 为了抵御潮汐，幼年马蹄蟹经常在沙子里挖洞。

sentences.en: Surprisingly, in areas where tidal currents are very weak, juvenile horseshoe crabs are found not to have significant barnacle populations, even though they seldom burrow.
sentences.cn: 令人惊讶的是，在潮汐流很弱的地方，幼年马蹄蟹的藤壶数量并不多，尽管它们很少在洞里活动。

sentences.en: For different individual horseshoe crabs, the circadian period ranged from 22.2 to 25.5 hours.
sentences.cn: 对于不同的鲎来说，其生理节奏的周期范围在22.2小时到25.5小时之间。
